import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const SignIn = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); //CURRENTLY NOT PROPERLY AUTHENTICATING. THE LOGIN BUTTON AUTO DIRECTS TO THE DASHBOARD PAGE. return (
setUser(event.target.value)} />
setPassword(event.target.value)} />
); }; export default SignIn;
